game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: To retrieve the lost artifact and return it to the rightful owner
game.description: The town elder has lost a precious artifact that has been in his family for generations. It's your task to find it and return it to him
game.reward: 500 gold coins and a unique piece of armor

task.objective: Speak to Elder Mathias and get more information about the lost artifact
task.description: The elder may have more information that can help in your search. Speak to him to find out more.
task.location: Elder's House in the white-chapel town

task.objective: Search the foretold location for the lost artifact
task.description: Based on the elder's information, the artifact must be hiding in a secret vault in the forest. Be prepared to face potential dangers guarding it.
